attractions.name: Badshahi Mosque
attractions.description: A Mughal-era mosque built in 1673, famous for its grandeur.

attractions.name: Shalimar Gardens
attractions.description: A Mughal garden complex built by Emperor Shah Jahan in 1641.

attractions.name: Mahbat khan mosque
attractions.description: white Mughal design mosque built in the 1600's with a large prayer hall & 2 minarets.
